translation.en: Ready to forget once and for all.
Now feel yourselves getting sleepier and sleepier.
Neither of you will remember the last year.
translation.zh: 你们都不会记得去年的事

translation.en: There is no place called The Further.
translation.zh: 没有一个叫深远的地方

translation.en: You will only remember Dalton's coma.
translation.zh: 你只会记得道尔顿的昏迷

translation.en: And let the darkness drift further...
[Dalton] For everything, there is a season.
and a time to throw away.
A time to mourn, and a time to dance.
translation.zh: 哀恸有时 跳舞有时

translation.en: A time for war, and a time for peace.
translation.zh: 战争有时 和平有时”

translation.en: [woman] We therefore commit this body to the ground.
translation.zh: 我们现在把这躯体埋在地下

translation.en: Earth to earth, ashes to ashes,
[Renai] It was a beautiful service for a beautiful grandma.
translation.zh: 这是为一位美丽的奶奶举行的庄严葬礼

translation.en: She loved you guys so much.
Your mother was a fine friend, Josh. Thank you.
translation.zh: -你妈妈是一个很好的朋友 乔希-谢谢

translation.en: I know she misses you too, Kali.
translation.zh: 我知道她也想念你 卡莉
死人不会想念任何东西

translation.en: Okay, that's not true, and she does miss you.
translation.zh: 好 那不是真的 她真的想念你

translation.en: See you guys next weekend, okay?
translation.zh: 下个周末再见你们 好吗？

translation.en: -See what I mean? -He's just anxious about leaving.
translation.zh: 明白我的意思吗？ 他只是急于离开
我知道 我知道 好吧

translation.en: Thank you for organizing all this. I just haven't had the bandwidth.
translation.zh: 谢谢你安排这一切 我太忙了

translation.en: Why don't you drive him to school?
translation.zh: 不如你开车送他去学校？

translation.en: You have a few weeks until all your students show up.
translation.zh: 你的学生们几星期后才到

translation.en: -Nah, he wouldn't want me to. -He's not the parent, you are.
translation.zh: -不了 他不要我送-他不是父母 你是

translation.en: If you don't want to, that's a different story.
translation.zh: 如果你不想 -那是另一回事-我不能

translation.en: Maybe some way that you guys could connect, that's all.
translation.zh: 也许你们能以别的方式沟通就是这样

translation.en: He's gonna be gone soon, so...
translation.zh: 他很快就离开了 所以
无论如何 考虑一下吧

translation.en: Appreciate you coming. I'm sorry I grabbed you.
translation.zh: 很感激你的到来 很抱歉把你叫住

translation.en: -I got a lot on my mind. -I'm sure.
Death floods the mind with memory.
translation.zh: 死亡令人回忆很多东西

translation.en: But there's always new ones to make, right?
translation.zh: 但是总是有新的回忆 对吗？

translation.en: [Josh] What did you just tell me? Well, just tell me, Dalton.
translation.zh: 为何不告诉我？告诉我 道尔顿

translation.en: Do you wanna clean--? Do you wanna keep the same diaper on?
We can just clean out the diaper and then put the same diaper back on.
translation.zh: 我告诉你 我们可以清理这尿片 然后穿回同一块尿片

translation.en: -[baby Dalton exclaims] -You like that? Okay, I'll do that, then.
translation.zh: 你喜欢 好 那我这样做

translation.en: What kind of outfit do you want?
-Oop. What kind of outfit do you want? -[baby Dalton babbling]
-[Renai laughing on recording] -Yeah? Well, tell me.
All you got to do is talk to me.
Come on. It's the greatest guy in the world.
translation.zh: 拜托 （道尔顿：好吧） 这是世上最伟大的男人

translation.en: You're gonna have to pull out of your little funk
or it's gonna be a long few days.
translation.zh: 不然接下来几天会很漫长

translation.en: ♪ But if you're tired Of the same old story ♪
♪ I'll be here when you are ready... ♪
Mom said you got that art teacher you wanted. What's his name?
translation.zh: 妈说你找到你想要的艺术老师他叫什么名字？

translation.en: I mean, she better be, with what we're paying.
♪ Those lives were mine To love and cherish ♪
♪ To guard and guide along life's way ♪
[Josh] All right. Let the fun begin.
Kappa Tau, huh? I was, uh, Kappa Z.
I'll take one for him. Just put it... Thank you.
translation.zh: 我替他拿一张 放在…谢谢

translation.en: Oh, all right. You get first dibs.
Why don't you pick a bed?
Mom got you this, uh, power station thing.
translation.zh: 妈给你买了这个电插座

translation.en: What do you got here? You got, uh, two outlets...
translation.zh: 有什么？你有两个插座 USB端口

translation.en: USB port, and, uh, two jumper cables, which are useless.
translation.zh: 有什么？你有两个插座 USB端口 还有两个跨接电缆 都是没用的

translation.en: Guess Mom put it in there.
This is intense. This what you been working on?
translation.zh: 太棒了 这是你一直在画的吗？

translation.en: Did you do this from memory?
It's from a photo I found at the house.
translation.zh: 根据我在家找到的一张照片

translation.en: Felt like. The last few years.
translation.zh: 曾经的感觉 在过去几年

translation.en: She had a tough go, you know, being a single mom.
translation.zh: 作为一名单亲妈妈 她过得不容易

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, that's... Yeah, that's tough.
translation.zh: 是的 那是 那很不容易

translation.en: Guess I didn't make the wall, huh?
translation.zh: 我想我的照片上不了墙吧？

translation.en: You know, I'm sorry I haven't been around lately.
Of course, my dad wasn't around at all, but...
translation.zh: 因为我爸完全不出现 但是…

translation.en: So, it could be a lot worse.
I've just been a little foggy past few years.
translation.zh: 我只是有点… 模糊 在过去几年我不知道 我的脑袋…

translation.en: I don't know, my brain just...
translation.zh: 模糊 在过去几年我不知道 我的脑袋…

translation.en: haven't been able to manage a time
translation.zh: 一直无法… 抽出时间

translation.en: for, uh, you and your brother and sister.
translation.zh: 抽出时间 给你和你的弟妹

translation.en: Have you ever thought about getting help?
translation.zh: 你有没有想过去看医生？

translation.en: I'm just trying to push through.

translation.zh: -你是道尔顿·兰伯特吗？-是 你是…
-你们一切还好吗？-没事 一切很好

translation.en: I just-- I thought my roommate would be a, um...
translation.zh: 我以为我的室友会是一个…

translation.en: I just figured it's a liberal arts school, and we mean "liberal."
translation.zh: 我以为这是一所文科学校我们的意思是“自由”

translation.en: Yeah, probably just confused by the name "Chris."
translation.zh: 可能被“克里斯”这个名字混淆了

translation.en: Right. 'Cause that would never happen with a name like "Dalton."
translation.zh: 对？因为“道尔顿”这个名字绝对不会搞错

translation.en: You know, I'm gonna go down to the housing office
translation.zh: 我这就下楼去宿舍管理处

translation.en: and get this all sorted out.
No, no, no. Please, father of Dalton. Allow me.
translation.zh: 不 拜托 道尔顿的父亲 让我去很明显我打扰你们培养亲子关系了

translation.en: I clearly interrupted some boy bonding.
translation.zh: 让我去很明显我打扰你们培养亲子关系了

translation.en: If you hate it, no worries. But you're not gonna hate it.
translation.zh: 如果你不喜欢 没关系 但是你不会不喜欢

translation.en: You really don't know me, do you? I mean, you really think I wanna join a frat?
translation.zh: 你真的不了解我 对吗？你以为我想加入兄弟会吗？
只是一个派对 道尔顿

translation.en: I mean, do it for me. I drove you here.
translation.zh: 为我而做 我开车送你来这里

translation.en: -You didn't even want to. -Of course I did.
I heard what Mom said at the funeral.
translation.zh: 我在丧礼上听到妈说的话

translation.en: Oh, so that makes you father of the year now?
translation.zh: 你就因此成为年度父亲吗？

translation.en: At least you've got a father.
Stop blaming your dad for shit you screwed up.
translation.zh: 别再因为你搞砸了而责怪你爸爸

translation.en: He left like 40 years ago. Get over it. God knows I'm not gonna be defined by you.
translation.zh: 他已经离开了40年 别再纠结了 上天知道我不会被你定义

translation.en: Are you kidding me? After all we have done for you?
translation.zh: 你认真的吗？这是我们为你付出那么多的回报？

translation.en: When did you become this ungrateful, little shit?
translation.zh: 你什么时候变得那么不感恩？

translation.en: You can tell it's Shania Twain, right?
translation.zh: 你能听出是仙妮亚·唐恩 对吧？

translation.en: So, what'd they say at housing?
translation.zh: 所以 宿舍管理处怎么说？

translation.en: I got to sleep here tonight.
But I'll get a new room tomorrow, so it's not a permanent thing.
translation.zh: 但是明天有新房间给我所以不是永久的

translation.en: -You're in the art school, I take it? -Yeah. Are you music?
translation.zh: -我猜你是念艺术学校的？-是的 你念音乐吗？
数学 我有考虑过音乐

translation.en: but the artist's life is one of nomadic instability
translation.zh: 但是艺术家的生活很不稳定

translation.en: But I'm sure you'll be super successful.
translation.zh: 但是我肯定你会超成功

translation.en: -Uh, just a little piano. -It's the same thing. Just blow.
translation.zh: 只是小钢琴 同样原理 只是这个是吹的

translation.en: It's just something my mom wrote.
what's some weird shit about you?

translation.zh: 拜托 所有人都有怪癖

translation.en: On Sundays, I wear a monocle and I order takeout with a British accent.
translation.zh: 星期天我戴着单片眼镜用英国腔点外卖

translation.en: Okay, sometimes I eat instant oatmeal,
translation.zh: 好 有时候我吃 即食燕麦

translation.en: uh, with no, like, water or milk or anything.
translation.zh: 没加水或奶或任何东西

translation.en: When I was 10, my parents died, and I went to go live with my Grandma Perkee,
translation.zh: 我十岁时 父母双亡去和珀基奶奶住在一起

translation.en: who once went almost nearly blind from a gnarly case of athlete's foot.
translation.zh: 她曾因严重的脚癣而差点失明

translation.en: I don't remember when I was 10.
At least that's what they told me, the few times that they would talk about it.
translation.zh: 至少几次谈起时 大家是这么说的

translation.en: I don't even remember being sick.
It's like I woke up one day and a whole year had passed.
translation.zh: 犹如一觉醒来 一年就过去了

translation.en: Yeah, honestly, I wish I could have forgotten a whole year when I was a kid.
translation.zh: 老实说 真希望我小时候能忘记一整年的事

translation.en: Uh... you know, there is one more weird thing about me.
translation.zh: 我还有… 一件很奇怪的事情

translation.en: Um, ever since my coma, I've been afraid of the dark.
translation.zh: 自从我昏迷后 我就很怕黑

translation.en: I was afraid of Barbie dolls till I was, like... now.
translation.zh: 我怕芭比娃娃直到… 现在

translation.en: There's nothing wrong with being scared.
Just as long as you don't keep me up with some bright-ass night light.
translation.zh: 只要你不会用明亮的夜灯打扰我
没关系 我会解决的

translation.en: I can't get to the phone right now, so leave me a message and I'll give you a call back.
translation.zh: 现在我不能接听电话留言 我会打给你

translation.en: -[answering machine beeps] -[Josh] Hey, bud. It's me.
Just making sure you're getting settled in okay.
translation.zh: 只是要确保你安顿下来了

translation.en: I was just, uh, thinking about what you said...
I don't know. I don't know what's going on with me, but, um...
translation.zh: 我不知道 我不知道我… 发生了什么事 但是…

translation.en: And I just wanted you to know that.
translation.zh: 我只想让你知道这一点

translation.en: Pull out something that will interest me.
translation.zh: 拿出一些令我感兴趣的东西
它看起来像一张照片 谢谢

translation.en: [Alec] I worked my ass off on this piece.
translation.zh: 我花了很多心血在这幅画上
终于 我们的第一个伤亡

translation.en: Usually, I go through introductions before someone quits.
translation.zh: 通常我会在有人退出之前进行介绍

translation.en: You just haven't realized it yet. You can go.
translation.zh: 只是你还没发觉 你可以走了
任何傻瓜都可以学习技术

translation.en: It doesn't mean anything if it doesn't come from inside.
translation.zh: 如果不是来自内心则没有任何意义

translation.en: I am not interested in the "rules of art."
translation.zh: 我对“艺术规则”不感兴趣

translation.en: We are going to break the rules.
Then I want you to break them again.
translation.zh: 然后我要你们再次打破它们

translation.en: See how broken you can get.
translation.zh: 看你们能把它们打得多破

translation.en: Why in the hell would you destroy a beautiful drawing like that?
translation.zh: 为何你要毁掉那么漂亮的画作？

translation.en: Good. You must let go of your past.
translation.zh: 好 你必须忘记你的过去

translation.en: Shed your skin in order to grow.

translation.zh: 每数一次 我要你们深入自己

translation.en: I want you to sink further and further into yourself.
translation.zh: 每数一次 我要你们深入自己 越加深入自己

translation.en: Do not lift the charcoal from the paper.
Draw whatever your soul brings forth.
translation.zh: 画出你的灵魂带来的一切

translation.en: You've got to be willing to dredge up

translation.zh: 你最丑陋最内心的想法

translation.en: Is it keeping you in or out?
translation.zh: 它把你锁在里面或外面？

translation.en: The machine is quite loud, but you'll be able to hear me.
translation.zh: 机器声音很大 但是你会听到我说话

translation.en: I'm going to need you to stay as still as possible throughout the procedure.
translation.zh: 我要你在整个过程中尽量保持不动

translation.en: If you feel like you need to get out of there,
give the call ball a squeeze, we'll give you a break.
translation.zh: 挤一下呼叫球 我们会让你出来

translation.en: [Brower over headphones] Okay. You comfortable, Josh?
translation.zh: 好 你感到舒适吗 乔希？

translation.en: Yep. Let's just get this over with.
translation.zh: 是 让我们快点完成它

translation.en: Dr. Brower, what did you say?
translation.zh: 布劳尔医生 你说什么？

translation.en: Okay, can you let me out, please?
translation.zh: 好 可以让我出来吗？

translation.en: -[call ball beeping] -Hello, hey! Can you let me out?
Okay, okay. Let me out. Let me out. Hey! Dr. Brower.
translation.zh: 好 让我出去 嘿！布劳尔医生
布劳尔医生 让我出去

translation.en: Come on. Get me out of here.
Just let me out. Let me out, let me out, let me out.
translation.zh: 快放我出去 放我出去

translation.en: -Who was that? Why did the lights go out? -Calm down.
translation.zh: 那是什么？为何熄灯了？ 冷静

translation.en: You said the lights went out?
All the lights went out and I got stuck in there, man.
translation.zh: 所有的灯都熄了 而我被困在里面

translation.en: You went right out. Your MRI went perfectly.
translation.zh: 你马上睡着了 你的核磁共振很顺利

translation.en: [Brower] There's nothing physically wrong with you. No growths or spots on the brain.
translation.zh: 你的身体没问题 脑袋没长东西
这是好消息 兰伯特先生

translation.en: Yeah, no, I know, I, uh...
I guess I was just hoping for something real.
translation.zh: 我想我只是希望一些东西是真的

translation.en: Something that could explain this fog.
translation.zh: 一些可以解释这段模糊记忆的东西

translation.en: The memory issues you're talking about,
they could be spurred on by a number of things.
translation.zh: 可以由几样东西刺激到

translation.en: Increased stress, change in daily habits.
translation.zh: 压力增加 日常习惯的改变

translation.en: Have there been any disruptions in your home life?
translation.zh: 你的家庭生活有没有受到干扰？

translation.en: My, uh, mom passed away recently.
Not to mention my son left for school,
translation.zh: 更别提我的儿子离家上大学

translation.en: and, uh, my ex-wife hardly talks to me, so...
translation.zh: 更别提我的儿子离家上大学 我的前妻几乎不和我说话 所以
-那听起来确实很有压力-是的

translation.en: Maybe a grief counselor be of some help?
translation.zh: 也许悲伤辅导员会有所帮助
是的 当然 可能有帮助

translation.en: Do you have any history of mental illness in your family?
translation.zh: 你的家族有精神病史吗？

translation.en: It's nothing to be alarmed about.
It can be informative as we try to make a diagnosis.
translation.zh: 我们尝试做出诊断时它可以提供信息
与此同时 你可以做一些运动

translation.en: games you can do to stimulate your memory.

translation.zh: 配对游戏 像孩子们玩的那种

translation.en: You want me to play kids' games?
We can learn a lot from kids.
translation.zh: 我们可以从小孩身上学到很多东西

translation.en: Got my new room assignment today.
translation.zh: 今天得到了我的新房间分配

translation.en: So, alas, no more panty parties.
translation.zh: 所以没有更多的内裤派对了
但是值得安慰的是我在323号房
所以要小心 年轻人

translation.en: lest I hear you slap your sausage in the dead of night.
translation.zh: 以免我在深夜听到你打手枪
你要参加一个兄弟会吗？ 什么？

translation.en: No, it's just something my dad got me.
translation.zh: 不 只是我爸替我拿的东西

translation.en: We can make fun of their khaki pants and trust funds.
translation.zh: 我们可以取笑他们的卡其裤和信托基金
除非你还没完成重新装饰

translation.en: Come on, Dolphin. Do something nice for your old man.
translation.zh: 去吧 乖乖男为你老爸做一些美好的事情

translation.en: What's the worst that could happen?
May I offer you some diaper pudding?
translation.zh: 我可以请你吃尿片布丁吗？

translation.en: Oh, come on. Quit your bitching and come here.
translation.zh: 拜托 别再抱怨 到这里来

translation.en: To memorialize the night that Dalton Lambert actually has fun!
translation.zh: 纪念道尔顿·兰伯特真正玩得开心的那个夜晚！

translation.en: [frat members] Nick the Dick! Nick the Dick! Nick the Dick!
Welcome to the Kappa House, and welcome back to school, baby.
translation.zh: 欢迎光临卡帕家 欢迎回到学校 宝贝

translation.en: I'm just here to remind you fine folks that frats,
translation.zh: 我是来提醒大家 兄弟会

translation.en: Right, and we must protect our right to party
translation.zh: 对 我们必须保护我们搞派对的权利

translation.en: White, Black, brown, or blue, you're all welcome at JPU,
translation.zh: 白 黑 褐或蓝 JPU欢迎你们

translation.en: that the frat house is the last house
translation.zh: 兄弟会之家是 男人还可以是男人的最后地方

translation.en: where men can still be men.
translation.zh: 男人还可以是男人的最后地方

translation.en: Now, we got a lot of drinking to do tonight,
We do not need another incident.
translation.zh: 我们不需要另一场意外

translation.en: -[student] Hey, rest in peace! -This party's lame.
Confirmed. So, let's go upstairs and look through everyone's shit.
translation.zh: 确认了我们上楼去看每一个人的东西

translation.en: And this is Nick's butthole cream.
I'm going to go spread this on the communal crapper. BRB.
translation.zh: 我要把它涂在公共厕所上 很快回来

translation.en: [man] Make it stop. -Make it stop. -[haunting music playing]
[Nick] I'll be right back. I just need some supplies.
translation.zh: 我很快回来 我需要一些物品
嘿 佩奇 我是尼克

translation.en: ♪ Tonight is your night, bro Tonight is the night ♪
translation.zh: 今晚是你的夜晚 兄弟 就在今晚
（特洛伊 玛格南） 来吧

translation.en: A dance would be nice. We can dance.
translation.zh: 跳舞好 我们可以跳舞

translation.en: I think I just saw something...
-[Nick] Is somebody in my room? -Shit, shit, shit.
One of you peckerwoods is about to get the hammer drop.
translation.zh: 你们其中一个将被揍一顿

translation.en: We were just looking for some privacy, you know?
translation.zh: 我们正在找一个隐蔽的地方 你知道吗？我们要做了

translation.en: I'd rather watch my parents do it.
We might get drunk enough to find you attractive.
translation.zh: 我们可能会醉到觉得你有吸引力

translation.en: Even though you look like a clown.
translation.zh: 虽然你看起来像个小丑

translation.en: I'm more partial to kick the dick.
That was pretty quick thinking back there, right?
translation.zh: 刚才脑筋转得很快 对吗？

translation.en: [groans] I should've asked before I kissed you, right?
translation.zh: 我应该在吻你之前问你 对吗？

translation.en: I am sorry. I was just... I was going on instinct.
translation.zh: 对不起 我只是 我是凭直觉做的

translation.en: I'm fine. It's just, I, um...
I'm just sorry for what he said to you.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉他刚才对你说那样的话

translation.en: You think I care what Vineyard Vines thinks? He should be so lucky.
translation.zh: 你以为我在乎那些公子哥的想法吗？他应该很庆幸

translation.en: [Josh on recording] Hey, buddy, it is, uh, me again.
translation.zh: 嘿 朋友 又是我

translation.en: Um, I went to the doctor.
Well, not okay. But I'm getting to the bottom of it.
translation.zh: 其实不好 但是我快找出原因了

translation.en: So, uh, just give me a call when you can.
translation.zh: 如果可以的话给我回个电话

translation.en: I'm really sorry, Dalton, about what I said the other day.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉 道尔顿 关于那天我说的话

translation.en: Please don't tell me you're really just a creep.
translation.zh: 请不要告诉我你是个变态

translation.en: Then what the hell is going on?
Something's happening to me. I'm seeing things, crazy things.
translation.zh: 有些东西发生在我身上我看到疯狂的东西

translation.en: You know that kid at the frat house that they talked about, with the incident?
translation.zh: 你记得他们提起跟这件事有关的那个兄弟会会员吗？

translation.en: -Uh-huh. -I saw him. And he was dead.
It started with an art exercise,
translation.zh: 这是由一个画画练习开始的

translation.en: and she asked us to dig deep into a memory, into our subconscious.
translation.zh: 她叫我们深入我们的潜意识记忆

translation.en: So, I did and I drew this door.
translation.zh: 我照做了并画了这扇门

translation.en: You really need to lay off the frat juice.
translation.zh: 你真的不能再喝兄弟会汁了

translation.en: Tonight, I was painting and I fell asleep.
translation.zh: 今晚 我在画画 然后睡着了

translation.en: And when I woke up, this lantern appeared.
translation.zh: 当我醒来后 这盏灯出现了

translation.en: It was like a dream, but it wasn't a dream.
translation.zh: 就像梦一样 但不是梦

translation.en: And then I walked to your room.

translation.zh: 我知道这听起来很荒谬

translation.en: I feel like I'm getting closer to something.
translation.zh: 我觉得我正在接近一些东西

translation.en: Or something's getting closer to me.
translation.zh: 或一些东西正在接近我
好了 妈 帮帮我

translation.en: [sighs] I don't know. I don't know.
The dance of light and shadow.
An effect used not only to create volume and definition,
translation.zh: 一种不仅用于创建体积和清晰度的效果

translation.en: but also a specific, unseen light source.
translation.zh: 也是一个特定 看不见的光源

translation.en: Right. This is one of Goya's best.
translation.zh: 好 这是戈雅最好的作品之一

translation.en: The negative space draws our eyes towards Saturn.
translation.zh: 负空间将我们的目光吸引到农业之神身上

translation.en: -Does it represent darkness or some void? -[haunting music playing]
translation.zh: 它代表黑暗还是某种虚无？

translation.en: Goya mastered it on the canvas,
translation.zh: 戈雅在画布上掌握了它

translation.en: but family problems and health issues sent this once-revered court painter
translation.zh: 但家庭和健康问题让这位曾受人尊敬的宫廷画家

translation.en: leading him to create this grisly portrait
translation.zh: 引导他创作这幅可怕的画像

translation.en: of a father devouring his son.
This balance between light and dark is what we're after.
translation.zh: 光与黑之间的平衡正是我们所追求的

translation.en: Your own experiences shape your artwork. Embrace them. Use them.
translation.zh: 你自身的经历塑造你的艺术作品 拥抱它们 利用它们

translation.en: Sink deep into the darkness of memory.

translation.zh: 什么事 呆子？ 一扇红门

translation.en: Come on, man. Doesn't that mean anything to you? A red door?
translation.zh: 拜托 这对你来说毫无意义吗？ 一扇红门？

translation.en: It's a thing from art class. It's a painting.
translation.zh: 这是艺术班的作业 是一幅画

translation.en: We had to find a memory.
translation.zh: 我们必须寻找一个记忆

translation.en: I thought it was something from our childhood.
translation.zh: 我以为是来自我们童年的东西

translation.en: No, I don't want to worry her.
translation.zh: 没有 我不想让她担心
这件事为什么会让她担心？

translation.en: -I don't know. -This what happens when you go to college?
translation.zh: -我不知道-这是你上大学后发生的吗？

translation.en: You get all cryptic and shit?
So, after the whole spooky dream-not-a-dream thing the other night,
translation.zh: 经过了那晚的似梦非梦的怪事

translation.en: "Yeah, okay, Dalton's a weirdo, but he's not insane, right?"
translation.zh: “好吧 道尔顿是个怪胎 但他不是疯子 对吗？”

translation.en: I'm gonna need that key back.
Right. So, I started poking around the old interwebs...
translation.zh: 好 我开始在网上搜索

translation.en: Looks like they filmed it in between shifts at Best Buy.
translation.zh: 看起来他们是在百思买的轮班间隙拍摄的

translation.en: Hey, guys, this is Spectral Sightings. I'm Specs, this is Tucker. Say hi, Tucker.
translation.zh: 大家好 这是灵异目击 我是斯佩克斯 这是塔克打个招呼 塔克
专业的超自然现象调查员

translation.en: We're gonna talk about something that dozens of you
translation.zh: 今天我们要谈论你们中的许多人

translation.en: [Specs] It's a real phenomenon. Our physical body falls asleep
translation.zh: 这是一个真实的现象我们的身体睡着了

translation.en: and our astral body leaves that physical body...
and floats off into another realm.
-That's exactly what it feels like. -See, I told you. It's cool, right?
translation.zh: -就是这种感觉-看 我说过了 很酷吧？

translation.en: Our former mentor, Dr. Elise Rainier,
translation.zh: 我们的前导师 埃莉斯·雷尼尔博士

translation.en: she had a name for this other realm.
translation.zh: 她替这另一个世界取了一个名字

translation.en: It's nice to see you all.
So, I'm here to talk to you about astral projection...
translation.zh: 我在这里跟大家解说灵体投射

translation.en: filled with tortured souls of the dead...
translation.zh: 充满了受折磨的死者灵魂

translation.en: to live the worst mistakes of their lives
translation.zh: 重复他们一生中最严重的错误

translation.en: over and over and over for all eternity.
translation.zh: 一遍又一遍 直到永远

translation.en: or you travel to this realm...
that you awaken with your presence.
Life is what they crave more than anything.
translation.zh: 生命是他们所渴望的 超过一切

translation.en: They want life, and they can come to our world to get it.
translation.zh: 他们要生命并可以来到我们的世界获取它

translation.en: [groans] I see those gears turning. What is it?
translation.zh: 我看到那些齿轮在转动 那是什么？

translation.en: -That kid from the frat house? -The pukey kid?
translation.zh: 那个来自兄弟会的孩子？ 那个呕吐的孩子？

translation.en: Yeah. He said something to me.
translation.zh: 是的 他对我说了一些话

translation.en: I'm sure he did. It probably wasn't his proudest moment.
translation.zh: 我肯定他说了这可能不是他最骄傲的时刻

translation.en: Yeah, but what if he meant something else?
translation.zh: 是 但是如果 他是别的意思呢？

translation.en: What if he was talking about this door?
translation.zh: 如果他说的是这扇门呢？

translation.en: So, what? You want to go back and ask him?
translation.zh: 那又如何？你要回去问他？

translation.en: Look, I feel bad for the dude, I do,
translation.zh: 我替他感到难过 真的

translation.en: but dark realms are typically places I try to avoid.
translation.zh: 但是黑暗世界是我特别想避开的
重要的信息 克里斯

translation.en: It's not like Nick the Dick is just gonna let you waltz into his bedroom
translation.zh: 但是鸡巴尼克绝不会让你大摇大摆地走进他的房间

translation.en: and chat with the ghost in his toilet.

translation.zh: 他绝不会知道我在那里

translation.en: -I got this. -[woman] Can I help you?

translation.zh: 你好 我把胸罩落在

translation.en: I have left my brassiere in Nicholas's room,
translation.zh: 你好 我把胸罩落在 在尼古拉斯的房间里想知道他是否在家？

translation.en: and I was wondering if he is perchance home?
translation.zh: 在尼古拉斯的房间里想知道他是否在家？

translation.en: I think he's upstairs studying with Paige.
[Chris in normal voice] Great job, Dolphin.
I'm gonna read you this. It's called In Flames.
translation.zh: 我要给你念这个 题目叫《火焰中》

translation.en: Very vulnerable piece. "Looking across a campfire,
translation.zh: 非常脆弱的作品 “望着篝火…”

translation.en: I need a room with darkness.
translation.zh: 我需要一间黑暗的房间

translation.en: You gonna float through the air and do a little "Ooh"?
translation.zh: 你打算飘在空中并发出“呜”的声音？

translation.en: And you never will be with that attitude, Casper.
translation.zh: 你这样的态度绝不会成为鬼 小鬼

translation.en: What are the chances those bedsheets are crusty?
translation.zh: 床单有硬块的可能性有多大？

translation.en: Probably snap like a taco shell.
translation.zh: 可能像炸玉米饼壳一样一碰就碎

translation.en: -Can you give me a little space, please? -Oh, yeah. Sorry.
translation.zh: -你能给我一些空间吗？-好 对不起
你在这里吗 道尔顿？
可能是创意写作双学位

translation.en: But I'm also crazy good at finance, so I don't want to waste that gift.
translation.zh: 但我也非常擅长金融 所以我不想浪费了那天赋

translation.en: How long do you have to keep that on?
[Nick] Seriously. Guys, who's messing with me?
translation.zh: 大伙们 谁在作弄我？

translation.en: -Chris. Hey. I didn't mean it like that... -Don't.
translation.zh: -克里斯 嘿 我不是这个意思-不要

translation.en: I just wanted to see if you're okay.
I'm sorry. I didn't know anyone could get hurt in the real world.
translation.zh: 对不起我不知道有人会在真实世界里受伤

translation.en: You have no idea what you're messing with.
translation.zh: 你不知道你触动了什么东西

translation.en: I can't be a part of this, Dalton.
translation.zh: 我不能参与其中 道尔顿

translation.en: And neither should you. Because next time, you might not wake up.
translation.zh: 你也不应该 因为下次 你可能醒不来

translation.en: Uh, it's not your weekend. Kali's at a sleepover and Foster's...
translation.zh: 这周末不是轮到你陪孩子们卡莉在外过夜

translation.en: I'm not here for the kids.
translation.zh: -而福斯特在…-我不是为了孩子而来的

translation.en: [Foster] Wow, two calls in one week.
translation.zh: 哇 一星期两通电话

translation.en: -[Dalton] Come on, man. -Haven't you made any friends yet?
Tell me everything you remember about my coma.
translation.zh: 把你记得的所有有关于我昏迷的事都告诉我
-我画的东西 它们…-那扇门？

translation.en: And now a guy with a hammer.
translation.zh: 现在是一个拿着锤子的男人

translation.en: -A hammer? -I think they could be clues from my past,
translation.zh: 锤子？ 我想它们可能是 我过去的线索

translation.en: thoughts that have disappeared 'cause of my coma.
translation.zh: 我在昏迷时消失的记忆我不知道为何

translation.en: -I don't know why they're coming out now-- -Wait. Dalton.
translation.zh: -它们现在浮现 但是它们和我…-等一等 道尔顿

translation.en: I've had this image in my mind for years.
translation.zh: 多年来 我脑海中一直有这个画面

translation.en: Mom always says it's not real. It's just a bad dream. But...
translation.zh: 妈总说那些事是假的只是一个恶梦 但是

translation.en: Tell me, little brother. Come on.
translation.zh: 告诉我 弟弟 拜托

translation.en: Okay. We're in a room somewhere. Like a basement.
translation.zh: 好 我们在某个地方的一个房间里像一个地下室

translation.en: All I ever wanted was to be better than my father.
translation.zh: 我只想做得比我父亲好

translation.en: You know that. Just to be a good dad.
translation.zh: 你知道的 只是想成为一位好父亲

translation.en: Well, if it's any consolation, I can't even get him to call me back.
translation.zh: 如果这能安慰你我甚至不能让他回我电话

translation.en: My dad abandoned his family, and...
translation.zh: 我爸爸抛弃他的家庭 而…

translation.en: You're not him, Josh, and you're allowed to be angry at him.
translation.zh: 你不是他 乔希 你可以生他的气

translation.en: I am angry. I've been angry for a long time.
translation.zh: 我生气 我生气了很久

translation.en: Angry at a man that I have never met.
translation.zh: 生气一个我从未见过的男人

translation.en: Angry at a man that jumped off the roof of a mental hospital in 1978.
translation.zh: 生气一个在1978年在精神病院跳楼的男人

translation.en: For more than 40 years, that man has been dead and gone.
translation.zh: 那个男人离开了40多年了

translation.en: So, how in the hell is he terrorizing me here, now, in the real world?
translation.zh: 他到底如何在这个现实世界中恐吓我呢？

translation.en: -He attacked me at Mom's... -He attacked you?
translation.zh: -他在妈的家攻击我-他攻击你？

translation.en: Yeah. So, am I just crazy, or...?
translation.zh: 是的 所以是我疯了 还是…

translation.en: left this for my mom the day he died.
translation.zh: 留下这个给我妈 在他死的那天

translation.en: -Josh... -Is that the answer? Am I just crazy?
Is his madness inside of me?
Is that why I've been so lost the past few years?
translation.zh: 这就是我在过去几年那么迷失的原因吗？

translation.en: Did I pass this curse on to our kids? Is he gonna haunt them...
translation.zh: 我是否把这诅咒传给了我们的孩子？他会不会缠住他们
-乔希-像他缠住我那样？我是说

translation.en: Why didn't my mother say anything about this?
translation.zh: -乔希 停-为什么我妈什么都没说？

translation.en: So, Dalton and I could travel to some other...
translation.zh: 道尔顿和我可以去另一个…

translation.en: where we were haunted by ghosts and goblins.
translation.zh: 我们被鬼魂和妖精缠住的地方

translation.en: like the one in those photos that haunted you.
translation.zh: 就像在照片中缠住你的那种

translation.en: And your father, he saw them too, and...
Back then, he told your mom. She didn't understand.
translation.zh: 那时 他告诉你妈 她不明白

translation.en: -She didn't know how to help him. -Help him like you helped us?
translation.zh: 她不知道如何帮助他 像你帮助我们一样帮助他？

translation.en: We all thought it was for the best, Josh. You included.
translation.zh: 我们当时都认为这样做最好乔希 包括你

translation.en: The suppression, it slowed you down.
translation.zh: 那样的压制让你慢下来

translation.en: And your mom and I, we didn't know what to do.
translation.zh: 你妈和我不知道怎么办

translation.en: And I was too scared to tell you the truth.
translation.zh: 而我太害怕告诉你真相

translation.en: He said my mom had secrets, that she was hiding something from us.
translation.zh: 他说我妈有秘密 她对我们隐瞒了一些事情

translation.en: I just never thought you did too.
-...you have kept this away from me. -...how hard it has been for me.
Because you tried to kill our family.
translation.zh: 因为你想杀了我们全家

translation.en: You chased us around the house with a goddamn baseball bat!
translation.zh: 你拿着垒球棒在屋子里追我们！

translation.en: that it wasn't you. I knew it was that...
translation.zh: 那不是你 我知道那是

translation.en: thing in those photos, but the kids? They don't understand.
translation.zh: 在照片里的那些东西可是孩子们呢？他们不明白

translation.en: All those night terrors that Foster had.
translation.zh: 福斯特所有的那些夜惊

translation.en: I've been lying to our children for a decade,
translation.zh: 我对我们的孩子撒谎了十年

translation.en: telling them those memories aren't real.
translation.zh: 告诉他们说那些记忆不是真的

translation.en: "They're just your imagination. Dad's not gonna hurt you."
translation.zh: “它们只是你们的幻觉” “爸爸是不会伤害你们的”
我不会这样做 但是你做了

translation.en: Doesn't matter to them what was controlling you.
translation.zh: 对他们来说 是什么控制了你并不重要

translation.en: What they saw was your face. It was you who was causing all that pain.
translation.zh: 他们只看到你的脸是你导致了那些痛苦

translation.en: That's why I pulled away. I just...
translation.zh: 所以我离开 我只是

translation.en: I couldn't live like that anymore.
translation.zh: 我不能再这样生活下去

translation.en: we could've gotten through this together.
Dalton just sent this to me.
He's been having nightmares and visions.
translation.zh: 他一直发恶梦和看到东西
一些关于一扇红门的东西

translation.en: -[Renai] It's gonna be okay. -[young Foster] I don't know.
translation.zh: 没事的 -没事的-我不知道

translation.en: It's okay. Nothing's gonna happen to us. I promise you, okay?
translation.zh: 没事 我们不会有事的我保证 好吗？

translation.en: Take care of your brother, Dalton.
translation.zh: 照顾你弟弟 道尔顿

translation.en: [young Foster] But why is Daddy mad at us?
translation.zh: 可是爸爸为什么生我们的气？

translation.en: I can go into the dark place and find Daddy.
translation.zh: 我可以进入黑暗的地方找爸爸

translation.en: -[Renai] No, it's too dangerous. -I can do it, though.
translation.zh: -不 太危险了-但我可以做到

translation.en: No! Stop! What are you doing?
[Tiny Tim] And now, my dear friends,
translation.zh: 现在 亲爱的朋友们

translation.en: I'd like to dedicate this song to all of you out there.
translation.zh: 我想把这首歌送给你们

translation.en: Wherever you may be, this song is for you.
translation.zh: 不管你们在哪里 这首歌献给你们

translation.en: Sitting on the floor, being weird. That's normal.
translation.zh: 坐在地上 举止怪异 那很正常

translation.en: Because I thought that when the power went out,
translation.zh: 你没事 对吗？因为… 我想停电的时候

translation.en: that you were messing with that dark realm shit again.
translation.zh: 也许你又进入那黑暗世界了

translation.en: [chuckles] And I know that you don't really care for the dark.
translation.zh: 我知道你并不在乎黑暗

translation.en: much like how I illuminate your life.
translation.zh: 正如我如何照亮你的人生

translation.en: I'm not afraid of the dark anymore.
Well, I hauled these all the way down here,
translation.zh: 我一路把这些拖到这里
所以无论怎样都要弄好它

translation.en: Even though you're totally freaking annoying. Jeez.
translation.zh: 虽然它们真的很恼人 天啊

translation.en: I got your text and I wrote a snarky response.
translation.zh: 我收到你的短信并回了一个尖酸的回应

translation.en: because Grandma Perkee always told me to never escalate an argument over text.
translation.zh: 因为珀基奶奶时常告诉我不要在短信里吵架

translation.en: But, I mean, if you want my opinion...
translation.zh: 但是如果你要我的意见

translation.en: Don't go digging around in your past.
Some things are just better left buried, you know?
translation.zh: 有些东西最好让它永远不见天日 明白吗？

translation.en: sometimes you just have to move on.
I'm gonna get you out of this place, Dalton.
translation.zh: 我会救你出去 道尔顿

translation.en: We're gonna get out of here and we're gonna get home, okay?
translation.zh: 我们要离开这里 我们回家 好吗？
我们永远不会再回那里

translation.en: Dalton, tell me you're in there.
translation.zh: 道尔顿 告诉我你在那里面

translation.en: Dalton, I know you're in there.
translation.zh: 道尔顿 我知道你在里面

translation.en: But if you touch me again, I'm gonna fuck you up.
translation.zh: 但是如果你再碰我 我会揍你

translation.en: Dalton, these things, they can possess our bodies.
translation.zh: 道尔顿 这些东西能附我们的身

translation.en: It happened to me, and now he's done it to you.
translation.zh: 这发生在我身上现在他对你做同样的事情

translation.en: -[yells] No! -We can't hold it back, Dad.

translation.zh: 儿子 我们必须尝试

translation.en: We got to find something to block it. Something to seal it.
translation.zh: 我们必须找些东西挡住它一些封锁它的东西

translation.en: [Chris] You need to get rid of that thing. Burn it, forget about it.
translation.zh: 你必须除掉那东西 烧掉它 忘记它

translation.en: No, no, forgetting it doesn't work. We need to remember.
translation.zh: 不 忘记它行不通 我们必须记住

translation.en: Yes. Yes, he's back. He's okay.
translation.zh: 是的 他回来了 他没事

translation.en: Tell Foster to pack his history homework. I'll help him with it.
translation.zh: 告诉福斯特带他的历史作业我会帮他

translation.en: Could come a little earlier if you want. Join us for dinner.
translation.zh: 如果你想的话早点来和我们一起吃晚餐
好 我很乐意 谢谢

translation.en: Guess I'm just lost in memories.
There's so much I want to tell her.
translation.zh: 我有很多东西要告诉她

translation.en: You have a bright future ahead.

translation.zh: 保持稳定的步伐 乔希
